content: संनिहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Placed near, lying close, near, contiguous, neighbouring; <ls>Ś. 4.</ls> {@--2@} Close, proximate, at hand. {@--3@} Present; अपि संनिहितोऽत्र कुलपतिः <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; हृदयसंनिहिते <ls>Ś. 3. 19.</ls> {@--4@} Fixed, placed, deposited. {@--5@} Prepared, ready; <ls>Mu. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Staying or being in. --तं Proximity, vicinity.
